This is an app widget description

Welcome to She Safe! She Safe is designed to empower women with an essential tool for their safety. Our app is built with a unique feature that can detect danger and send out SOS messages to your defined contacts with just a few effort to get help.

Our mission is to create a safer world for women, by providing a reliable and easy-to-use tool that can quickly alert your loved ones in case of an emergency. We understand that women\'s safety is a crucial issue, and our app is designed to provide the necessary support and protection needed for women to feel safe and secure.
